review:
This one of the best movie of Salman Khan (2007) the songs of Partner mind-blowing and impressive . I'm waiting for Partner 2 to Released soon in the near future . In the sequel they need to improve better than the first film with Action scenes and comedy scenes should be there in partner 2 Who Will reprise their roles from the first film 
Salman Khan
Govinda
Lara Dutta 
The rest of them unknown ??
I will give 🌟🌟🌟🌟 🌟 🌟🌟 out of 10

The story has a good plot but the way prem insults bhaskar is not very funny. I would also like to add that this movie is remake of the 2005 film Hitch. And trust me here friends the original is definitely better
amaze..... very comedian scenes done by sallu bhai and Sir Govinda. Madaam Katrina and Lara Dutta doing beautiful scene. Future want to see dis trio again. Thanking you........ welcome

I feel very well about this movie.because this movie is perfect of comfort and it gave proper guidance for every youth to make his life cheerfulness.
Really an amazing💕😍 movie. Katrina and Lara was looking soo cute. Good acting was done by actors.
I have never such a horribel comedy movie like partner. No story was there at all. Acting cum jokery was there a lot. Dosnt make sense.
A remake of Hitch. That's what this is. Lazy Bollywood recycling movie ideas... That aside, is it enjoyable? Aside from the cheesiness that comes with Bollywood productions, sure...
Great Comedy and Acting done By Both Govinda and Salman Khan . Katrina was as useless as washing car in the rain

Fantastic film what a line govinda sir can do 
Better every one in the film best comedy salman did brilliant.
Salman khan is very stylish and cool in this movie.katreena and salman its very popular jodi in the bollywood and all of world.this movie is fantistic.
This movie was funny and more over acting of Govinda was too horrible. But over all the Movie was AWESOME.
